function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decreased job opportunities in the solar industry due to layoffs and staff reductions","Impact":"Unemployment, economic downturn in the solar industry","Mitigation":"Diversification of job opportunities, financial support for affected workers","Technologies":"Job training programs, government subsidies for renewable energy sectors","People":"Workers in the solar industry","Owner":"Government, renewable energy companies"},{"Description":"Dependency on imported solar PV technology from China leading to supply chain disruptions","Impact":"Reduced capacity for solar installations, economic impact on renewable energy sectors","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply sources, investment in domestic production","Technologies":"Local manufacturing capabilities, supply chain management systems","People":"Renewable energy companies, governments","Owner":"Renewable energy companies, governments"},{"Description":"Disruption of global oil markets and natural gas spot prices due to Covid-19","Impact":"Economic instability, reduced investment in fossil fuel markets","Mitigation":"Diversification of energy sources, investment in renewable energy","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, energy storage systems","People":"Oil and gas industry workers, investors in fossil fuel markets","Owner":"Governments, renewable energy companies"}]}
